result.eng: I was studying hard before the exams.
result.ga: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduithe
result.orig: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduithe
result.html: Bhí mé ag staidéar go dian roimh na scrúduitheI was studying hard before the exams.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag staidéar go dian roiṁ na scrúduiṫeI was studying hard before the exams.

result.eng: The men were able to work hard.
result.ga: Bhí na fir in ann obair go crua
result.orig: Bhí na fir in ann obair go crua
result.html: Bhí na fir in ann obair go cruaThe men were able to work hard.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí na fir in ann obair go cruaThe men were able to work hard.

result.eng: It's hard for children when their parents separate.
result.ga: Bíonn sé dian ar na páistí nuair a scarann a dtuismitheoirí óna chéile
result.orig: Bíonn sé dian ar na páistí nuair a scarann a dtuismitheoirí óna chéile
result.html: Bíonn sé dian ar na páistí nuair a scarann a dtuismitheoirí óna chéileIt's hard for children when their parents separate.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn sé dian ar na páistí nuair a scarann a dtuismiṫeoirí óna ċéileIt's hard for children when their parents separate.

result.html: D'fhéadfainn obair go cruaI could work hard.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟéadfainn obair go cruaI could work hard.

result.eng: I usually listen very hard at these lectures.
result.ga: Is gnách dom éisteacht go géar ag na léachtaí seo
result.orig: Is gnách dom éisteacht go géar ag na léachtaí seo
result.html: Is gnách dom éisteacht go géar ag na léachtaí seoI usually listen very hard at these lectures.
result.ponchtml: Is gnáċ dom éisteaċt go géar ag na léaċtaí seoI usually listen very hard at these lectures.

result.html: Tá an cheist deacairThe question is hard.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ċeist deacairThe question is hard.

result.ga: Tá sé ag obair go dian
result.orig: Tá sé ag obair go dian
result.html: Tá sé ag obair go dianHe is working hard.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag obair go dianHe is working hard.

result.eng: Life was getting hard for them.
result.ga: Bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthu
result.orig: Bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthu
result.html: Bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthuLife was getting hard for them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an saol ag cur cruaiḋ orṫuLife was getting hard for them.

result.eng: Going to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ga: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.orig: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.html: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadhGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḋoiliġ a ġaḃáil ċun faoiside Ina ḋiaiḋ sin dar leis féin go gcaiṫfeaḋ sé an gealltanas a ċoṁlíonaḋGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
